fields.Title of Contribution: Biztech: Global Synergies for Students, Faculty, Firms, and Governments
fields.Name of Conference: 2019 Consurtium on Undergradute International Business Annual Conference
fields.Description/Abstract: I describe the creation and progress of the first cohort of Asia Biztech, a program between Boise State University's College of Business and Economics, College of Engineering, and School of Public Poilcy. On the Taiwan side we work with Providence University in Taichung, the Taiwan US Industrial Cooperation and Promotion Office, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and a number of other private and public organizations. At the time of the talk, we were preparing for Cohort #2.
